HomePage.heroTitle: You have a vision. I have the code to bring it to life.
HomePage.heroSubtitle: Hi, I'm Gincoder. A freelance web developer based in Haiti, crafting beautiful, high-performance websites and AI solutions that captivate and convert. Ready to make your mark?

about.title: From Code to Creation: My Developer Journey
about.p1: I am a passionate and results-oriented developer with a knack for turning complex problems into elegant, user-friendly digital experiences. My journey into technology started with a deep curiosity for how things work, which evolved into a full-blown passion for building robust websites and intelligent applications.
about.p2: Based in Haiti, I bring a unique perspective and a relentless drive to deliver world-class digital products. My expertise lies in the modern web stack, particularly Next.js and React for building lightning-fast frontends, and Genkit for integrating powerful AI capabilities. I don't just write code; I build solutions that drive growth and solve real-world problems for my clients.

seo.title: SEO & Performance
seo.description: Technical SEO, Core Web Vitals, Analytics

process.title: A Blueprint for Success
process.subtitle: My process is built on clarity, collaboration, and a commitment to quality, ensuring your project's success from start to finish.

step1.title: Discovery & Strategy
step1.description: We start with a deep dive into your goals, audience, and challenges to define a clear roadmap for the project.

step2.title: Design & Development
step2.description: I craft a pixel-perfect design and write clean, scalable code to bring the vision to life, with regular check-ins.

step3.title: Testing & Refinement
step3.description: Rigorous testing across devices ensures a bug-free experience. I refine every detail based on feedback.

step4.title: Launch & Support
step4.description: After a smooth deployment, I provide ongoing support to ensure your website runs flawlessly and continues to evolve.

HomePage.portfolioSubtitle: Explore the digital experiences I've brought to life—each a story of collaboration and code.
HomePage.servicesTitle: Your Vision, Expertly Forged in Code
HomePage.servicesSubtitle: I offer a full suite of services to build your digital presence from the ground up, from sleek e-commerce sites to dynamic portfolios.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Have questions? I have answers. Here are some common inquiries about my process and services.

q1.question: What is the typical timeline for a new website project?
q1.answer: A typical showcase website takes about 1 to 3 weeks from our initial discovery call to launch. More complex applications, like a custom web app with user accounts, can take 4 to 8 weeks. The final timeline depends on the project's scope, complexity, and how quickly I receive content and feedback from you.

q2.question: Do you offer services for clients outside of Haiti?
q2.answer: Absolutely! The beauty of web development is its global nature. I work with clients from all over the world. We can communicate via email, WhatsApp, or video calls to ensure a smooth collaboration regardless of your location.

q3.question: What makes you different from other developers?
q3.answer: I combine technical expertise with a strong focus on business goals. I don't just build what's asked; I partner with you to understand your objectives and build a solution that delivers real, measurable results. My proficiency in both modern web development (Next.js) and emerging AI technologies (Genkit) allows me to create truly innovative and future-proof products.

q4.question: What kind of support do you offer after the project is launched?
q4.answer: I offer a 30-day period of free support after launch to fix any bugs or issues that may arise. After that, I offer flexible monthly maintenance plans to handle updates, security checks, and minor feature additions to keep your site in top shape.

faq.title: Your Questions, Answered
faq.subtitle: Here are answers to some common questions about my services.

q1.question: Which service is right for my business?
q1.answer: It depends on your goals! If you're starting out, a 'Showcase Website' is perfect for establishing a professional presence. If you want to drive sales, an 'Advanced Landing Page' is ideal. For saving time, consider our 'Task Automation' or 'AI Responder' services. The best way to know is to request a quote, and we can discuss your specific needs.

q2.question: Can you integrate payment systems into my website?
q2.answer: Yes, absolutely. I can integrate popular and secure payment gateways like Stripe or PayPal into your website, whether it's for an e-commerce platform, a booking system, or a custom application. Security and reliability are my top priorities.

q3.question: How do you handle custom feature requests?
q3.answer: I love building custom features! We'll start with a detailed discussion to understand the functionality you need. I'll then provide a technical proposal and a price estimate. Once approved, I'll build and integrate the feature into your existing site or as part of a new project.

q4.question: Are your websites mobile-friendly?
q4.answer: 100%. Every website I build is fully responsive, meaning it will look and work perfectly on all devices, including desktops, tablets, and smartphones. A seamless mobile experience is critical for user engagement and SEO.
